sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Cipher Mining (CIFR) Stock News: Wall Street Zen Downgrade, Insider Sales Filings, and What to Watch for Monday
feed.summary: Cipher Mining (NASDAQ: CIFR) faces a complex market dynamic, balancing short-term Bitcoin-driven volatility with long-term ambitions in data centers and AI/HPC hosting. Recent news includes a "Sell" downgrade from Wall Street Zen and insider stock sales, though overall analyst sentiment remains bullish with mid-$20s price targets. The company's strategic moves, such as acquiring the Ohio "Ulysses" site and a significant lease with Amazon Web Services for AI workloads, underpin its growth narrative despite current high stock volatility.

feed.title: Cipher Mining (CIFR) Advances AI & HPC Infrastructure With Ulysses Site Buy
feed.summary: Cipher Mining (CIFR) has acquired a 200MW Ulysses site in Ohio, marking its first acquisition outside of Texas and expanding its capacity for High-Performance Computing (HPC) hosting. Compass Point reiterated a "Buy" rating on CIFR with a $28 price target, viewing the Ulysses site as a strategic win that offers entry into the key PJM market for AI and HPC demand. The site is expected to begin operations in Q4 2027 and is positioned as a medium-term HPC-ready asset, supporting Cipher's goal to expand its HPC hosting footprint alongside its bitcoin mining operations.

feed.title: Voya Investment Management LLC Acquires 327,912 Shares of Cipher Mining Inc. $CIFR
feed.summary: Voya Investment Management LLC significantly increased its stake in Cipher Mining Inc. (NASDAQ:CIFR) by 454.3% in the third quarter, purchasing an additional 327,912 shares and bringing its total holdings to 400,090 shares valued at approximately $5.04 million. Despite institutional buying, company insiders have sold millions of shares totaling over $127 million in the last 90 days. Cipher Mining reported strong Q3 results, beating revenue and EPS estimates, and has a consensus "Moderate Buy" analyst rating with a target price of $24.73.

feed.title: Newsome James E sells $349k in Cipher Mining (CIFR) stock
feed.summary: James E. Newsome, a Director at Cipher Mining Inc. (NASDAQ:CIFR), sold 21,821 shares of company stock for a total of $349,790. This transaction occurred amidst a 197% gain for CIFR over the past year. Cipher Mining is also expanding with a new 200-megawatt site in Ohio and recently completed a $333 million senior notes offering.

feed.title: Insider Selling: Cipher Mining (NASDAQ:CIFR) Director Sells 49,867 Shares of Stock
feed.summary: Cipher Mining (NASDAQ:CIFR) Director Wesley Hastie Williams sold 49,867 shares of the company's stock on December 19th for a total value of $801,861.36, reducing his ownership by 23.97%. Despite the insider selling, analysts maintain a "Moderate Buy" rating on CIFR with a consensus target price of $24.73, following the company's recent beat on quarterly EPS and revenue estimates. The company's stock currently trades around $15.91.

feed.title: Cipher Mining stock gains on new 200MW Ohio site, Compass Point reiterates Buy
feed.summary: Cipher Mining (NASDAQ:CIFR) announced plans for a new 200MW mining facility in Ohio, named Ulysses, marking its first expansion outside Texas. Following this news, Compass Point reaffirmed its Buy rating and a $28.00 price target for the stock, indicating a potential 72% upside. The company's stock has surged over 213% in the past year, reflecting investor confidence in its expansion and strategic positioning for high-performance computing.

feed.title: Cipher Mining (NASDAQ:CIFR) Shares Gap Down - Here's Why
feed.summary: Shares of Cipher Mining (NASDAQ:CIFR) gapped down premarket but recovered some losses, with analysts largely maintaining a "Moderate Buy" rating and an average price target of $24.73. Despite beating quarterly revenue and EPS estimates, the company remains unprofitable and has seen significant insider selling totaling approximately $200.6 million in the last 90 days. Institutional investors, however, have shown a mix of new positions and increased holdings.

feed.title: Cipher Mining acquires 200 MW Ohio site for data center expansion
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. has acquired a 200-megawatt site in Ohio called Ulysses, marking its first expansion outside Texas. This acquisition diversifies Cipher's operations beyond Texas, adding 195 acres and secured capacity from AEP Ohio, and positions the company for high-performance computing applications with expected energization in Q4 2027. The company's stock has shown strong momentum, and analysts anticipate significant revenue growth.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Expands Beyond Texas With 200 MW Ohio Site Acquisition
feed.summary: Cipher Mining (CIFR) announced the acquisition of a 200-megawatt (MW) site in Ohio, named "Ulysses," marking its expansion beyond Texas. This acquisition includes 195 acres and secured utility agreements, expected to connect to the power grid by Q4 2027, increasing Cipher's development pipeline to 3.4 GW across eight sites. The site is deemed suitable for high-performance computing (HPC), aligning with Cipher's aggressive push into AI and HPC, as seen in recent deals with Fluidstack and Amazon Web Services.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Inc. Acquires 200 MW Site in Ohio for High-Performance Computing Applications
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. has acquired a 200-megawatt site named "Ulysses" in Ohio, encompassing 195 acres, marking its first acquisition outside Texas. This site is tailored for high-performance computing (HPC) applications and is expected to be operational by Q4 2027, providing direct access to the PJM wholesale electricity market. The acquisition expands Cipher's development pipeline to 3.4 gigawatts across eight sites, demonstrating its commitment to diversifying its business footprint and meeting the growing demand for large-scale HPC infrastructure.

feed.title: Cipher Mining expands beyond Texas with 200 MW Ohio site acquisition
feed.summary: Cipher Mining has acquired a 200 MW site in Ohio, marking its first expansion outside Texas. This acquisition is part of its strategy to diversify its mining operations and grow its hash rate capacity. The company aims to leverage the site's energy infrastructure for future development.

feed.title: Inside a new 200 MW Ohio site planned for high-performance computing
feed.summary: Cipher Mining (NASDAQ: CIFR) has acquired a 200 MW site in Ohio named Ulysses, including 195 acres and secured capacity from AEP Ohio. This marks Cipher's first acquisition outside Texas, expanding its development pipeline to 3.4 GW across 8 sites. The site, set to energize in Q4 2027, will provide direct access to PJM and is ideally suited for high-performance computing and hosting services.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Announces Acquisition of 200 MW Site in Ohio
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. (NASDAQ: CIFR) has acquired a 200-megawatt site in Ohio, named "Ulysses," which includes 195 acres of land and secured capacity from AEP Ohio. This site, suitable for high-performance computing (HPC) applications, is expected to be energized in the fourth quarter of 2027 and will provide direct access to the PJM electricity market. This acquisition marks Cipher’s first outside of Texas, expanding its development pipeline to 3.4 GW across eight sites.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Announces Acquisition of 200 MW Site in Ohio
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. (NASDAQ: CIFR) announced the acquisition of a 200-megawatt site in Ohio, named "Ulysses," which includes 195 acres and interconnection approvals to access the PJM market. The site is expected to energize in Q4 2027 and is strategically suited for high-performance computing (HPC) applications. This acquisition marks Cipher's first outside of Texas, expanding its geographical footprint and increasing its development pipeline to 3.4 GW across eight sites.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Inc. Announces Acquisition of 200 Mw Site in Ohio
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. has acquired a 200-megawatt site in Ohio named "Ulysses," which includes 195 acres and secured capacity from AEP Ohio. The site is expected to energize in Q4 2027 and will provide direct access to the PJM wholesale electricity market. This acquisition diversifies Cipher's development pipeline, bringing its total to 3.4 GW across 8 sites.

feed.title: This Bitcoin Infrastructure Stock Is Up 182% and Now Commands 11% of One Portfolio
feed.summary: Aurelius Capital Management acquired 500,000 shares of Cipher Mining (NASDAQ:CIFR) during Q3, making it their third-largest holding at $6.3 million, representing 11.4% of their reportable assets. Cipher Mining shares have surged 182% over the past year, significantly outperforming the S&P 500, indicating a strong conviction in the Bitcoin infrastructure and AI hosting sectors. The company's strategic shift to include substantial AI hosting lease payments, alongside its bitcoin mining operations, suggests a durable capital allocation strategy.

feed.title: This Bitcoin Infrastructure Stock Is Up 182% and Now Commands 11% of One Portfolio
feed.summary: Aurelius Capital Management recently acquired 500,000 shares in Cipher Mining (NASDAQ:CIFR), making it their third-largest holding and representing 11.4% of their 13F reportable assets. Cipher Mining's stock has surged 182% over the past year, significantly outperforming the S&P 500, due to strong third-quarter revenue and strategic expansion into AI hosting lease payments, including a 15-year agreement with Amazon Web Services. This move highlights a high-conviction investment thesis in the bitcoin mining and infrastructure sector, betting on the potential of crypto and AI infrastructure for durable capital allocation.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Inc (CIFR) Stock News Today: Analyst Targets, Insider Filings, Bitcoin Link, and the 2026 AI Data Center Outlook (Dec. 18, 2025)
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. (CIFR) is navigating both short-term crypto volatility and a strategic pivot towards AI/HPC data center infrastructure. While the stock experiences choppy trading influenced by Bitcoin, analysts generally maintain a bullish "Moderate Buy" rating, anticipating significant upside from its long-dated contracts with hyperscalers like AWS and Fluidstack. However, insider selling and the company's current unprofitability present risks as it transitions its business model.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Inc. (NASDAQ:CIFR) Receives Average Rating of "Moderate Buy" from Analysts
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. (NASDAQ:CIFR) has received a consensus "Moderate Buy" rating from fifteen brokerages, with an average twelve-month target price of $24.73. Despite recent insider selling totaling $223.28 million and concentrated ownership by corporate insiders at 2.63%, the company beat Q1 earnings and revenue expectations. Analysts forecast a fiscal year EPS of -$0.31, with hedge funds also substantially increasing their holdings.

feed.title: Why Cipher Mining (CIFR) Is Down 23.8% After Its $8.5 Billion AI Pivot From Bitcoin
feed.summary: Cipher Mining (CIFR) is transitioning from Bitcoin mining to AI and high-performance computing data centers, securing long-term leases with Amazon Web Services and Fluidstack potentially worth $8.5 billion. This pivot creates a hybrid profile, balancing contracted AI infrastructure revenue with ongoing Bitcoin price exposure and significant upfront capital expenditure. Investors are evaluating how this shift will reshape Cipher Mining's investment narrative and influence its future valuation as it aims for substantial revenue and earnings growth by 2028.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Faces Dramatic Plummet: Is There Hope?
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. (NASDAQ: CIFR) has seen a dramatic stock price decrease of 3.34% amid market uncertainty, with a 12.5% intraday dip closing at $14.92. The company's recent third-quarter earnings report revealed a complex financial picture with decent gross and EBITDA margins but a negative pre-tax profit margin and high leverage. While short-term liquidity is adequate, significant operating losses and negative free cash flow raise concerns about long-term profitability and sustainability.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Soars 297% in 6 Months: Buy, Sell or Hold the Stock?
feed.summary: Cipher Mining (CIFR) shares have risen significantly due to its transformation from a bitcoin miner to an AI infrastructure developer. While long-term contracts with Amazon Web Services and Fluidstack enhance revenue visibility, near-term financial headwinds, bitcoin price volatility, and widening loss estimates for 2026 suggest a cautious "Hold" position. The stock's technical indicators also point to limited short-term upside, despite the attractive long-term potential in AI and high-performance computing.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Stock Is Sliding Today: What's Happening?
feed.summary: Cipher Mining shares slipped following a Bitcoin pullback below $86,000 and broader weakness in crypto-linked and momentum stocks. Despite a Buy rating and $27 price target from Canaccord Genuity, the stock shows near-term bearish indicators, although it has delivered a 101% gain over the past year. Analysts attribute the decline to profit-taking and renewed caution regarding AI infrastructure valuations.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Stock Is Sliding Today: What's Happening? - Cipher Mining (NASDAQ:CIFR)
feed.summary: Cipher Mining (NASDAQ: CIFR) shares fell on Monday due to Bitcoin's pullback and a broader decline in crypto-linked momentum stocks. Bitcoin's consolidation below $86,000, after a significant post-election surge, is weighing on crypto markets. Despite near-term volatility and technical indicators suggesting weakness, analysts maintain a Buy rating on Cipher Mining, citing strong longer-term fundamentals.

feed.title: Marex Group plc Makes New $333,000 Investment in Cipher Mining Inc. $CIFR

feed.title: Looking At Cipher Mining's Recent Unusual Options Activity
feed.summary: High-rolling investors have shown unusual options activity in Cipher Mining (NASDAQ: CIFR), with 12 options trades spotted, predominantly bullish. This activity, including significant call options, suggests that some investors may have privileged information and are targeting a price range of $10.0 to $30.0 for the stock. Analysts have also issued ratings, with a consensus target price of $25.0, reflecting varied expert opinions on the stock's future performance.

feed.title: Cipher Mining (CIFR) Stock Today (Dec. 16, 2025): Latest News, AI Data-Center Deals, Analyst Forecasts, and What Investors Are Watching
feed.summary: Cipher Mining (CIFR) stock is experiencing volatility due to both Bitcoin price swings and its evolving role as an AI/HPC data-center landlord. The company has secured significant lease agreements with AWS ($5.5 billion) and expanded its partnership with Fluidstack (backed by Google), transforming its business model beyond just Bitcoin mining. Investors are closely monitoring the execution of these major construction projects and the impact of the company's complex capital structure on its stock performance.

feed.title: Cipher (CIFR) Tumbles 13.5% on AI Bubble, Bitcoin Drop
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. (NASDAQ:CIFR) experienced a 13.55% drop in its share price due to a decline in Bitcoin prices and renewed concerns about an AI bubble, triggered by Oracle's substantial debt for AI investments. The company's fall occurred despite a "buy" recommendation and a $27 price target from Canaccord Genuity, signaling an 83% upside potential. Additionally, Cipher announced plans to redeem outstanding warrants by December 26, 2025.

feed.title: Sticky Situation: Why CIFR Is Down
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. (CIFR) stock traded down by 13.14% due to regulatory challenges, operational delays, and negative earnings reports. The company faces profitability concerns, liquidity constraints, and increased long-term debt, leading to investor skepticism and heightened stock volatility. Analysts advise caution, suggesting potential recovery hinges on addressing profitability and leveraging new growth avenues.

feed.title: Cipher Mining (CIFR) Stock Drops on Dec. 15, 2025: Bitcoin Slide, AI Data Center Pivot, Analyst Targets, and What’s Next
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. (NASDAQ: CIFR) experienced a significant stock drop of approximately 13% on December 15, 2025, largely due to a slide in Bitcoin prices. However, the company is actively pivoting from solely being a Bitcoin miner to becoming an AI/HPC data center landlord, securing major contracts with Amazon Web Services and Fluidstack (backed by Google). This strategic shift aims to transform its revenue mix from crypto-dependent to more stable, long-term infrastructure-like income, though current volatility reflects its transitional phase.

feed.title: Canaccord Genuity Group Reiterates "Buy" Rating for Cipher Mining (NASDAQ:CIFR)
feed.summary: Canaccord Genuity Group has reiterated its "Buy" rating for Cipher Mining (NASDAQ:CIFR) with a $27 price target, suggesting a significant upside. The broader analyst consensus for CIFR is "Moderate Buy" with an average price target of $24.73, despite the company currently being unprofitable and experiencing substantial insider selling. Cipher Mining recently reported better-than-expected revenue and EPS, although it still maintains a negative net margin.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Edges Past $19 Mark Amid Uneven Market Ride
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. (NASDAQ: CIFR) stocks have been trading down by 8.02% due to market concerns over regulatory changes and Bitcoin’s volatility. Despite revenues of $151.27M, the company struggles with operating losses and negative profit margins, indicating a need for streamlined strategies and improved operational effectiveness to achieve sustained progression amidst competitive pressures. The article highlights the importance of well-informed decisions in a volatile market.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Inc. $CIFR Shares Bought by Rhumbline Advisers

feed.title: Two Seas Capital LP Purchases New Shares in Cipher Mining Inc. $CIFR
feed.summary: Two Seas Capital LP acquired 250,000 new shares of Cipher Mining Inc. ($CIFR) valued at approximately $1.195 million, despite net selling by insiders. The company recently exceeded earnings estimates, reporting ($0.01) EPS and $106.69 million in revenue for the last quarter.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Gains: Analyzing the Recent Surge
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. (CIFR) stock has surged over 6% due to positive market sentiment and strategic initiatives. Key drivers include an upgrade from JPMorgan to "overweight" with a new price target of $18, a significant 10-year colocation deal with Fluidstack valued up to $9 billion, and the redemption of outstanding warrants. Additionally, $333 million in secured notes are fueling expansion, further solidifying Cipher's position in the US Bitcoin mining market.

feed.title: Cipher (CIFR) Drops Hard on Profit-Taking from 44% Surge Last Week
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. (CIFR) experienced a sharp decline in its stock value this week, following a substantial 44% surge in the prior week. This downturn is attributed to profit-taking by investors after the recent rally. The company is set to release its Q3 financials later this month, which will provide further insight into its performance.

feed.title: Cipher Mining (NASDAQ: CIFR) to Redeem All Remaining Warrants with Cashless Exercise
feed.summary: Cipher Mining (NASDAQ: CIFR) announced it will redeem all outstanding warrants issued under its October 19, 2020 agreement. Warrants not exercised by December 26, 2025, at 5:00 p.m. New York time will be redeemed for $0.01 per warrant. The company's Board of Directors has mandated a cashless exercise, meaning holders will receive 0.2687 shares per warrant instead of paying the $11.50 exercise price.

feed.title: Cipher Mining (CIFR) Climbs 9.3% as JPMorgan Expects Bitcoin Surge to $240,000
feed.summary: Cipher Mining (CIFR) stock rose 9.3% after JPMorgan projected Bitcoin prices to reach $240,000 long-term, despite a recent dip. Bitcoin remains Cipher Mining's primary revenue source, with operations generating $71.7 million in Q3, a significant increase from last year, even as the company moves into AI servicing.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Announces Redemption and Cashless Exercise of Outstanding Warrants
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. has announced the redemption of all its outstanding warrants to purchase shares of its common stock. The company has exercised its right to redeem these warrants due to its stock price meeting the required threshold, and holders will now only be able to exercise them on a cashless basis, receiving 0.2687 of a share of common stock for each warrant. Warrants unexercised by December 26, 2025, will be void.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Stock Is Climbing. Google Backs Another Data Center Deal.
feed.summary: Shares of Cipher Mining surged after the data center operator announced an $830 million expansion to its computing agreement with Fluidstack, an AI cloud platform. The deal is backed by Alphabet's Google.

feed.title: Cipher Mining (NASDAQ: CIFR) to Offer $333M of Additional Senior Secured Notes Due 2030
feed.summary: Cipher Mining (NASDAQ: CIFR) announced a proposed private offering of an additional $333.0 million in 7.125% senior secured notes due 2030. The proceeds from this offering will be used to finance construction costs for new facilities at the Barber Lake Facility in Texas, bringing the total outstanding notes to $1.733 billion. These additional notes will have identical terms to previous notes issued on November 13, 2025, and will be secured by first-priority liens on substantially all of the Issuer's and Guarantor's assets.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Secures $333M for Texas Facility Expansion
feed.summary: Cipher Mining (CIFR) has secured $333 million through a private offering of senior secured notes by its subsidiary, Cipher Compute LLC. These funds are designated for the expansion of its Barber Lake Facility in Texas, aiming to enhance operational capabilities. While strategic advancements provide a positive outlook, profitability and valuation concerns persist, leading to a "Neutral" rating from TipRanks' AI Analyst, Spark.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Inc. Announces Pricing of $333 Million of Additional Senior Secured Notes
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. announced that its subsidiary, Cipher Compute LLC, has priced $333.0 million of additional 7.125% senior secured notes due 2030. The offering is expected to close around November 24, 2025, with proceeds intended to finance construction costs for additional facilities at the Barber Lake Facility. Upon completion, the Issuer will have $1.733 billion in aggregate principal amount of these notes outstanding.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Inc. Announces Pricing of $1.4 Billion of Senior Secured Notes
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. announced that its subsidiary, Cipher Compute LLC, has priced a $1.4 billion offering of 7.125% senior secured notes due 2030 at par. The proceeds will finance the construction of the Barber Lake Facility, a high-performance computing data center in Texas. The offering is expected to close on November 13, 2025, subject to market conditions.

feed.title: Cipher Mining Announces Date of Third Quarter 2025 Business Update Conference Call
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. (NASDAQ: CIFR) announced it will release its third quarter 2025 financial results and provide a business update before U.S. markets open on Monday, November 3rd, 2025. The company will also host a conference call and webcast on the same day at 8:00 a.m. Eastern Time. These updates can be accessed via the investor relations section of Cipher's website.

feed.title: Cipher Mining (NASDAQ:CIFR) Stock Price Down 9.2% - Time to Sell?
feed.summary: Cipher Mining Inc. (NASDAQ:CIFR) experienced a 9.2% stock price decline, trading at $18.08 with an increased volume of 33.7 million shares. Despite this recent drop and significant insider selling amounting to over 22 million shares, analysts largely maintain buy ratings with target prices ranging from $12.00 to $25.00, indicating a mixed but generally positive outlook on the stock's future. The company recently reported quarterly earnings, meeting EPS consensus but missing revenue estimates, and institutional investors have been actively adjusting their holdings.

feed.title: Tiptree Advisors LLC Acquires New Holdings in Cipher Mining Inc. $CIFR
feed.summary: Tiptree Advisors LLC has acquired a new stake of 150,000 shares in Cipher Mining Inc., valued at approximately $717,000, making it their 20th largest holding. Despite a recent 9.2% stock decrease, analysts maintain a positive outlook, with several firms raising price targets and a consensus "Moderate Buy" rating.
